question: return policy
answer: You can return most items within 14 days of delivery if they are unused and in original packaging. Please include the receipt or order confirmation.

question: refund process
answer: Refunds are processed to your original payment method within 3–5 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.

question: shipping time
answer: Standard shipping takes 3–5 business days within Lebanon and up to 10 days for international orders.

question: cancel order
answer: Orders can be canceled within 12 hours of placement from your account dashboard or by contacting support.

question: exchange policy
answer: We allow exchanges for items of equal or lesser value within 7 days of delivery.

question: warranty period
answer: All electronic products include a 1-year limited warranty covering manufacturing defects.

question: payment methods
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Cash on Delivery for local orders.

question: contact support
answer: You can reach our support team by email at support@livedrop.com or via the chat widget on our site.

question: privacy policy
answer: We never share your personal information with third parties without consent. All data is encrypted and stored securely.

question: delayed delivery
answer: If your order is delayed beyond the estimated date, you may contact support for an update or refund.
